name: Bread
description: Nothing is as versatile or as filling as bread. Bread spread thick with golden butter and drizzled with a touch of honey. Bread with raspberry and blackberry jam fairly dripping from the crust. If anything reflects thousands of years of men and women cooking, it is bread. Even today, bread remains a staple. More than that, it is part of our traditions and memories. Bread is a volume of methods, heirloom recipes, and a sprinkling of our stories growing up around the oven and floured wooden countertops. It is to be enjoyed on the couch and used in the kitchen. A way for us to pass down the traditions handed to us and held so dear. Contact us for shipping rates outside the following countries: United States, Canada, United Kingdom, and Australia. 76 pages, perfect bound, matte. Printed in the US.

name: Jam
description: There is something soul soothing simple harvest. It has been a summer-long experience my whole life. Anticipation growing, we would run to the back of Grandma's yard down by the honeysuckle, to see if the berries were ripe... A lot has changed over the years, but the taste of jam has been constantly comforting. This book offers a collection of small batch recipes for every day, providing potential for everything from cartons to bushels of sun-warmed fruit. Inside you’ll find stories of our childhoods when we concocted various dishes and treats with jam. Each recipe is taught in a way that’s easy to follow from the beginner to the advanced cook. Contact us for shipping rates outside the following countries: United States, Canada, United Kingdom, and Australia. 62 pages, perfect bound, matte. Printed in the US.

name: Forest Icons
description: 5 high-quality vector hipster forest icons that will add a little spice to your design, blog or graphic! These icons come ready to be placed on just about anything, online or in print! These icons are inherently hipster, and as I was drawing them, I listened to plenty of Lumineers, and a lot of Mumford & Sons, just to make sure they turned out perfectly. Download product: you should receive your link within 24 business hours of ordering.
